text:
- Jeff Fink with FloQast,
AWS Alliance Manager.

FloQast is purpose-built by
accountants for accountants,
and we're natively on AWS,
and we have over 3,000 customers
that are across all different industries.
And we see that the gen AI
is impacting the accounting profession
by automating a lot of the mundane tasks
that are repetitive and manual.
And the impact is really retention
and also recruitment for the CFO
or for their accountants and controllers.
The biggest misconception of gen AI

amongst the general public, I
think that there's a couple.

One is that it is something
that would replace all

of our jobs and be
something that, you know,

almost like this humans versus
robots kind of talk track.

And then I also think
that there's a second one
around just the fear of the unknown
and what is this thing actually.

And the funny thing to me is
that we've been using gen AI
on our phones in the form of autocorrect
for almost 10 years,
and companies have been using gen AI

or machine learning for
even longer in some cases.

So, really, it's all about
how you can leverage gen AI
to fix problems

instead of being a solution
looking for a problem.
AWS can support us on our gen AI journey
by sharing more practical approaches
to putting gene AI in place

and also what other customers
are doing with gen AI

and how they're using it and
what's successful for them.
AWS helps our company be more scalable

and more efficient so that
we can achieve our mission
of forever elevating accounting.
(upbeat music)
